data.fullContent: Every company has a set of policies. These policies cover a wide variety of topics, from hiring employees to promoting them. The policies serve a number of purposes including ensuring that the company remains compliant with state and federal regulations and providing a set of guidelines to help employees be more efficient. Many companies not only have a set of official rules, but also have some unofficially adopted policies. For example, at one company, employees are permitted to take five extra days off throughout the year to promote personal wellness. Employees who have been around for a long time know these unofficial policies and share their knowledge with newly hired members of the company.
